title: The Sister Circle
description: Seven unlikely women.One unbreakable bond.When Evelyn Peerbaugh hung the ancient sign in front of her house, she had no idea how life was about to change. In a matter of days she became the newly widowed owner of a busy boardinghouse, trying to cope with the lives and emotions of the most incompatible group of women ever gathered under one roof.As the women settle into their roles at Peerbaugh Place, they discover the true meaning of friendship . . . and the joy of lives truly surrendered to God.
author: Vonette Bright
